name: Hornet Networks Ltd
description: Operator of a social networking application intended to connect the members of the LGBTQ community. The company's platform utilizes a proprietary technology to establish meaningful connections between gay individuals in a refreshingly friendly environment filled with original content and news related to lifestyle, travel, entertainment and social justice, enabling people hailing from the queer community to come out and join in the fun and fabulous of the gay community.
one_liner: Operator of a social networking application intended to connect the members of the LGBTQ community. The company's platform utilizes a proprietary technology to establish meaningful connections between gay individuals in a refreshingly friendly environment filled with original content and news related to lifestyle, travel, entertainment and social justice, enabling people hailing from the queer community to come out and join in the fun and fabulous of the gay community.
